message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you.  Given its potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $13,500.  What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is quite a bit below what I had in mind. How about we meet in the middle? Would you consider $11,750?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $10,500?
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this.  $10,500 is getting closer, but I need to be closer to $11,000 to make this work.  Would you be willing to do $11,000 even?
I'm still a bit hesitant to go all the way to $11,000, Alice. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,750?
